resources.string: Share the command to send it to your PC or a nerdy friend

If your device isn\'t rooted, you can manually grant the required permission by executing the following ADB command from your PC (the command is one line) \'adb shell pm grant com.tomer.poke.notifier android.permission.READ_LOGS\' Once you have done that, the app should work properly.
This app needs a special permission to read system logs. If you don\'t have root, choose \'Root workaround\' to get instructions on how to enable non-root method.
adb shell pm grant com.tomer.poke.notifier android.permission.READ_LOGS
Notifications for GO service is inactive
Notifications for GO service is active

Notifications for GO will send you notifications about new Pokémon nearby while the Pokémon GO app is opened. To use this app you must be rooted or manually grant READ_LOGS permission for the app.\n\nYou won\'t receive notifications while \'INCENSE\' is active
